snippet.title: Triglav Old Trailer
snippet.description:
A hack and slash type action RPG exploring a 50-story tower. In a richly detailed pixel art world, create your own character and go for the top of the tower by solving mysteries.

App Store:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/triglav/id1410545078?mt=8
Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.SmokymonkeyS.Triglav
